Uses of Interface
nom.tam.util.OutputWriter

  • Packages that use OutputWriter 
    Package Description
    nom.tam.util  

    • Uses of OutputWriter in nom.tam.util

      Subinterfaces of OutputWriter in nom.tam.util 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  RandomAccess
      These packages define the methods which indicate that an i/o stream may be accessed in arbitrary order.
      interface  ReadWriteAccess
      Interface for basic random access read and write operations.
      Classes in nom.tam.util that implement OutputWriter 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ArrayDataFile
      Efficient reading and writing of arrays to and from files, with custom encoding.
      class  ArrayOutputStream
      Efficient reading of binary arrays from streams with custom binary encoding.
      class  BufferedDataOutputStream
      Deprecated.
      Use FitsOutputStream, which provides the exact same functionality but with a less misleading name, or else use ArrayOutputStream as a base for an implementation with any (non-FITS) encoding.
      class  BufferedFile
      Deprecated.
      Use FitsFile instead, which replaces the old BufferedFile with a less misleading name, or else ArrayDataFile, which provides a base for a more more generic implementation for efficient reading/writing arrays using any (non-FITS) encoding.
      class  ByteArrayIO
      A class for reading and writing into byte arrays with a stream-like interface.
      class  FitsFile
      This class is intended for high performance reading and writing FITS files or block of FITS-formatted data.
      class  FitsOutputStream
      This class is intended for high performance writing FITS files or FITS data blocks.
      Methods in nom.tam.util that return OutputWriter 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static OutputWriter OutputWriter.from​(OutputStream o)
      Wraps an output stream with this interface.
      Methods in nom.tam.util with parameters of type OutputWriter 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected void ArrayEncoder.setOutput​(OutputWriter o)
      Sets the output to which encoded data should be written (directly or from the conversion buffer).
      Constructors in nom.tam.util with parameters of type OutputWriter 
      Constructor Description
      ArrayEncoder​(OutputWriter o)
      Instantiates a new Java-to-binary encoder for arrays, writing encoded data to the specified output.
      FitsEncoder​(OutputWriter o)
      Instantiates a new FITS binary data encoder for converting Java arrays into FITS data representations
